Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class School

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelObservables.ProfessorPresenceObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.School
public class School extends ProfessorPresenceObservable
Class School represents a school that is assigned to a player. A school is composed of four parts: the entrance, which contains a list of students that is ready to be sent to an Island or in the dining room, the dining room, which contains a list of students that determine if a professor is present or not in the professor table, the professor table, that contains the professors that a player have, and the garrison, which contains the towers that are present in the school

      public boolean insertDiningRoom(Student student) throws FullDiningRoomException
      Method insertDiningRoom inserts a students in the dining room
      Parameters:
      student - the student to insert
      Returns:
      true if the player can take a coin, otherwise false
      Throws:
      FullDiningRoomException - if the dining room if full for the student's Realm Type

      @Deprecated public boolean moveFromEntranceToDiningRoom(RealmType studentType) throws StudentNotFoundException, FullDiningRoomException
      Deprecated.
      Method moveFromEntranceToDiningRoom pick a student from the entrance and puts it in the dining room
      Parameters:
      studentType - the Realm Type of the student to pick from the entrance
      Returns:
      true if the player can take a coin, otherwise false
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if the entrance doesn't have a student of specified Realm Type
      FullDiningRoomException - if the dining room if full for the student's Realm Type

    • insertDiningRoom

      public int insertDiningRoom(Student[] students, boolean notify, boolean isFromEntrance) throws FullDiningRoomException
      Insert the specified students in the dining room and returns the number of coins gained
      Parameters:
      students - the inserted students
      notify - true if the listener of the class will be informed, otherwise false
      isFromEntrance - true if the students come from the entrance, otherwise false
      Returns:
      the number of coins gained
      Throws:
      FullDiningRoomException - if the dining room is full for the specified type of students

    • restoreSchool

      protected void restoreSchool(Player playerOwner, Game game, GameConstants gameConstants)
      Restore the school after the game has been restored from persistence data
      Parameters:
      playerOwner - the owner of the school, that will listen the school
      game - the game of the school, that will observe the school
      gameConstants - tha game constants of the game
